verses.verse: If <S%H3884><s%> it had not been the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who was on our side <S%H3478><s%>, now may Israel say <S%H559><s%>;
If <S%H3884><s%> it had not been the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who was on our side <S%H120><s%>, when men rose up against us <S%H6965><s%>:
Then <S%H233><s%> they had swallowed us up <S%H1104><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%>, when their wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled against us <S%H2734><s%>:
Then <S%H233><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> had overwhelmed <S%H7857><s%> us <S%H5158><s%>, the stream had gone over <S%H5674><s%> our soul <S%H5315><s%>:
Then <S%H233><s%> the proud <S%H2121><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> had gone over <S%H5674><s%> our soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, who has not given <S%H5414><s%> us as a prey <S%H2964><s%> to their teeth <S%H8127><s%>.

Our soul <S%H5315><s%> is escaped <S%H4422><s%> as a bird <S%H6833><s%> out of the snare <S%H6341><s%> of the fowlers <S%H3369><s%>: the snare <S%H6341><s%> is broken <S%H7665><s%>, and we are escaped <S%H4422><s%>.
Our help <S%H5828><s%> is in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>.
